Package com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao

Class UserProjectDao

java.lang.Object
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao.AbstractDao<UserProjectEntity>
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao.UserProjectDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class UserProjectDao extends AbstractDao<UserProjectEntity>
The UserProjectDao class provides database operations for UserProjectEntity instances. It extends the AbstractDao class to inherit common database operations.
See Also:
